means: （爱斯基摩人的）圆顶的冰屋，拱形建筑物

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...冰屋（Igloo，因纽特语：iglu/ ᐃᒡᓗ，意为“房屋”），又译雪屋或音译为伊格鲁，是一种由雪块构造而成的居所，通常都有一个圆顶。冰屋常常会被人们与居住在加拿大辽阔的北部地区的原住民因纽特人联系起来，因为因纽特猎人们正是把冰屋作为他们在漫长的严冬中狩猎期间的临时住所。用.
igloo 血管紧张素, iglu 拱形建筑物, igloo 雪山小屋

means.word_mean: 1. an Eskimo hut; usually built of blocks (of sod or snow) in the shape of a dome

auth_sentence.content: The track that accompanies Match of the Day's goal of the month this season is In This City, by Iglu & Hartly.

auth_sentence.content: For somewhere even chillier than Britain, there is always a ski break, and Iglu.com still has a wide range of chalets and hotels.
